title: Ep. 40 - Don't Play With Wolves
description:
On today's show, the guys chat about Todd eating cans of tuna in the office and making everyone else feel miserable, Gorms complains about getting a middle seat on the flight back from Atlanta, have an in depth conversation about whether or not they would roam with the wolves at a wolf conservation, and do a deep dive into the economics of Super Bowl halftime commercials. Also, Todd wants to know what main character in a film the guys would replace themselves with. They also answer a few listener questions including their favorite 3 movies to watch when on vitamins, and everyone breaks down their worst and best jobs outside of working at Pat McAfee 1nc. As always, to close out the show, the guys each choose a song for Friday Bangerz to help send you into the weekend. It's a fun one. Come and have a good time with us.


This episode features @toddmccomas, @PatMcAfeeShow, @Digz, @nickmaraldo, @tyschmit, @BostonConnr, @HeyGorman, @VivalaZito, @evanfoxy, and @BaileyMccomas
dc:creator: The Pod
